_header: Our Lord Jesu of mights most
_description: Gospel, First Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Oure lord ihesu of mightes masteWas led anes thurgh þe hali gaste…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And þat god may vs knaw for hisAnd bring vs to his bigly blis
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ductus est iesu crist in desertum & cetera”; ends “Amen.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica prima quadragesime Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 42va)
BLHar4196.Facsimiles:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.37-43.
